summary: This is an internal email from a victim specialist at the New York Field Office regarding coordination with the Office of Victim Services (OVS) General Counsel to have the FBI case agent complete victim compensation forms for identified victims in the Epstein case.

persons.name: MS Victim Specialist
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating with OVS General Counsel to have FBI case agents complete victim compensation forms for identified Epstein victims.

persons.name: OVS General Counsel
persons.role: General Counsel for Office of Victim Services
persons.context: Provided language and approval for the FBI case agent to complete OVS/FBI victim compensation forms for identified victims.

connections.description: Coordinated on the process for FBI case agents to complete victim compensation forms for identified Epstein victims.

events.title: Coordination on Victim Compensation Forms
events.description: MS Victim Specialist spoke with OVS General Counsel and obtained approval and language for FBI case agents to complete OVS/FBI victim compensation forms for identified Epstein victims.

keyFacts: The Office of Victim Services (OVS) General Counsel approved FBI case agents completing victim compensation forms for identified Epstein victims.
A standardized OVS/FBI Victim Form was to be used for each identified victim.
The email indicates ongoing victim assistance efforts by the FBI's New York Field Office in September 2019.
The communication shows inter-agency coordination (FBI and OVS) regarding victim compensation procedures.
